      • nextFailedMessageToRetry

        java.lang.Long nextFailedMessageToRetry()
        The offset of message, which is to be re-emitted. Spout will fetch messages starting from this offset and resend them, except completed messages.

      • shouldReEmitMsg

        boolean shouldReEmitMsg(java.lang.Long offset)
        Decide whether the message corresponding to the offset should be emitted NOW
        Parameters:
        offset -
        Returns:
        True if the message corresponding to the offset should be emitted NOW. False otherwise.

      • retryFurther

        boolean retryFurther(java.lang.Long offset)
        Spout will clean up the state for this offset if false is returned.
        Parameters:
        offset -
        Returns:
        True if the message will be retried again. False otherwise.

      • clearOffsetsBefore

        java.util.Set<java.lang.Long> clearOffsetsBefore(java.lang.Long kafkaOffset)
        Clear any offsets before kafkaOffset. These offsets are no longer available in kafka.
        Parameters:
        kafkaOffset -
        Returns:
        Set of offsets removed.
